mapper.select: SELECT c.id computer_id, c.brand computer_brand, c.model computer_model, c.photo computer_photo, c.price computer_price, c.production_date computer_production_date, cu.user user, mf.id mainframe_id, mf.brand mainframe_brand, mf.model mainframe_model, mf.photo mainframe_photo, mf.price mainframe_price, mf.production_date mainframe_production_date, mf.type mainframe_type, monitor.id monitor_id, monitor.brand monitor_brand, monitor.model monitor_model, monitor.photo monitor_photo, monitor.price monitor_price, monitor.max_resolution monitor_max_resolution, monitor.production_date monitor_production_date, monitor.type monitor_type, k.id keyboard_id, k.brand keyboard_brand, k.color keyboard_color, k.model keyboard_model, k.photo keyboard_photo, k.price keyboard_price, k.interface_type keyboard_interface_type, k.production_date keyboard_production_date, k.type keyboard_type, k.is_wireless keyboard_wireless, mouse.id mouse_id, mouse.brand mouse_brand, mouse.color mouse_color, mouse.model mouse_model, mouse.photo mouse_photo, mouse.price mouse_price, mouse.production_date mouse_production_date, mouse.type mouse_type, mouse.is_wireless mouse_wireless, s.id software_id, s.name software_name, s.file_size software_size, s.vender software_vender, s.version software_version FROM t_computer c left JOIN t_computer_user cu on c.id = cu.fk left join t_mainframe mf ON c.mainframe_id = mf.id left JOIN t_monitor monitor ON c.monitor_id = monitor.id left JOIN t_keyboard k ON c.keyboard_id = k.id left JOIN t_mouse mouse ON c.mouse_id = mouse.id left join t_computer_software cs on cs.COMPUTER_ID = c.id left join t_software s on cs.software_id = s.id where c.id = #{id}
